Figure 2:VideoUFOis the first dataset curated in alignment with real-world users’ focused topics for text-to-video generation. Specifically, the dataset comprises over1.091.091.091.09million video clips spanning1,29112911,2911 , 291topics. Here, we select the top20202020most popular topics for illustration. Researchers can use our VideoUFO to train or fine-tune their text-to-video generative models to better meet users’ needs.

Figure 7:The calculation process of BenchUFO. It is designed to evaluate whether a text-to-video model can effectively generate videos that contain user-focused topics. It comprises 791 concrete noun topics, each paired with10101010real-world user-provided prompts.
